actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 230 - 192 (Record Vote No: 276).
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A concurrent resolution providing for a conditional adjournment of the House from August 1 or 2 to September 4, 1985, and a conditional adjournment of the Senate from August 1 or 2 to September 4 or 9, 1985.

summary.text: Provides for a conditional adjournment of the House of Representatives from August 1 or 2, 1985, to September 4, 1985, and a conditional adjournment of the Senate from August 1 or 2, 1985, to September 4 or 9, 1985.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for a conditional adjournment of the House from August 1 or 2 to September 4, 1985, and a conditional adjournment of the Senate from August 1 or 2 to September 4 or 9, 1985.
